questions.questionText: What year was this album released?
questions.description: Crisis is the third studio album from Canadian post-hardcore band Alexisonfire, released on August 22, 2006.

questions.alt: A rock to represent rock music
questions.questionText: What rock band got its start in Ajax Ontario?
questions.description: Sum 41 is a Canadian rock band from Ajax, Ontario. The band was formed in 1996.

questions.questionText: Which Slipknot member is known for his spikey mask?
questions.description: Craig Jones is the former sampler and keyboardist for Slipknot known for his spikey helmet. He left Slipknot in 2023.

questions.questionText: What is the metal band that consists of fictional characters from League of Legends called?
questions.description: Pentakill is one of 4 bands with real music made 'by' League of Legends characters.

questions.questionText: What Swedish metal band released the album 'Atoma'?
questions.description: Atoma is the eleventh studio album by Swedish melodic death metal band Dark Tranquillity. It was released on 4 November 2016.
